channel.title: [NOOB] PI Question
channel.description:
If i am going to code a 525 PI server do I just follow basic PI tutorials or does it have to be a 525 PI tutorial.
Also can someone link me to a 525 Pi source if they know one?
Thanks, sorry for being a big noob :|

item.title: [NOOB] PI Question
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“kickyamom50, post:3, topic:376910”][quote author=monkey money30 link=topic=472826.msg3458065#msg3458065 date=1294204711]
Run.bat

@echo off
title DSPK
java -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

[/quote]

So you’re leeching DSPK, eh? :hurr:[/quote]

Hes used the run for it, hows that leeching.

If you loading a 525 cache, just follow normal PI tuts.

The graphics are cache/client sided

Read full topic

item.title: [NOOB] PI Question
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

Depends what you mean, PI with 525 graphics and GFX’s or 525 PI

Can’t get a 525 PI source, but you can get one with 525 graphics + GFX’s, I suggest using DSPK (Destination-Pk) Search it on google.

And you would most likley have to code it in the basic sort of format as many PI tutorials.

If you are going to use DSPK source, I will give you a little heads up on a few things.

Change the name of your bank + the owners name + site advertisement in quest tab, use RSInterface.java (CLIENT sided, thats pretty basic but it was something I forgot when I got DSPK source)

The Announcements.ini file in the source files advertises DSPK, open that with notepad and empty the announcements or change them to what you would like.

Also the compiler and run don’t work on DSPK source, replace.

Run.bat

@echo off
title DSPK
java -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Compiler

@echo off
:build
cls
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java
pause
goto :build
pause

for the compiler to work (BASIC) please make sure to change ‘jdk1.6.0_18’ to your version of JDK.

Read full topic
